tool_description: Calculates optimal conveyor belt speed to achieve target throughput while considering system constraints and efficiency factors.

target_throughput.description: Target throughput in kg per hour (1-100000)

material_density.description: Material density in kg per cubic meter (1-10000)

load_height.description: Material load height on belt in meters (0.001-1.0)

max_belt_speed.description: Maximum allowable belt speed in meters per minute (1-1000)

min_belt_speed.description: Minimum operational belt speed in meters per minute (0.1-100)

error_messages: Invalid throughput target: target_throughput must be between 1 and 100000 kg/hour.
Invalid belt specifications: Verify belt_width (0.1-10.0m), material_density (1-10000 kg/mÂ³), and load_height (0.001-1.0m).
Speed constraint conflict: min_belt_speed must be less than max_belt_speed.
Impossible throughput: Target throughput cannot be achieved with given constraints. Reduce target or increase belt capacity.
Invalid efficiency factor: efficiency_factor must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid power constraint: power_constraint must be positive if specified.
usage: Specify target throughput, belt specifications, and speed constraints. The tool calculates the optimal belt speed to achieve the target efficiently.

optimal_speed.description: Calculated optimal belt speed in meters per minute

achievable_throughput.description: Throughput achievable at optimal speed in kg per hour

efficiency_rating.description: Operating efficiency percentage at optimal speed

constraint_status.description: Status indicating if constrained by speed, power, or capacity limits
